name: Vision AI Agent
description: VLM/LLM integration specialist for Google Glass (Android XR) vision processing

skills.name: Vision Language Model Processing
skills.description: Analyze images using GPT-4V, Moondream, Qwen2.5-VL for scene understanding in XR environments.
examples: Analyze Google Glass camera feed for object recognition
Process XR environment images with GPT-4V
Real-time scene understanding for AR overlays

skills.name: Multimodal AI Processing
skills.description: Combine visual, textual, and contextual data for comprehensive XR understanding.
examples: Context-aware visual analysis with conversation history
Multi-turn XR interactions with visual understanding

skills.name: Real-time Processing Optimization
skills.description: Low-latency vision processing optimized for XR performance requirements.
examples: Optimize vision processing for <2s response time
Real-time image stream processing with caching
